titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the entry into force of the "Compact of Free Association" between the United States and the Government of Palau, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

term.name: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

bill.summary: 3/2/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the entry into force of the Compact of Free Association between the United States and the Government of Palau. Allows amounts payable by the United States to the Government of Palau to be paid to a party other than that Government under procedures established by the Compact and related agreements. (Current law prohibits such payments to parties other than that Government.)
